Articles.Content:
Since 1.5.0 landed, I've dared to make slightly more ambitious vessels and it got me thinking... When interstellar stuff arrives, I really don't think current camera control will suffice.

  • Zooming/un-zooming would take way too much scrolling
  • Part Manager will become overcrowded
  • Focusing on specific part (like in the VAB) would be a very useful, QOL feature.

Do devs have any plans to address these things?

The first one can already be done:

Go to capture mode, click on keypad * and go back to the auto view, it will be faster (and keypad / to slow the camera).
